body_html:
I'm on a Mac, and I get "7516360704 maximum resident set size" (~7.5G), which is way more than your 1.5G. I agree that is a lot. There are probably a few unnecessary copies in there.

We'll gladly take fixes that reduce the memory consumption.

body:
I'm on a Mac, and I get "7516360704  maximum resident set size" (~7.5G), which is way more than your 1.5G. I agree that is a lot. There are probably a few unnecessary copies in there. 

We'll gladly take fixes that reduce the memory consumption.
